full_summary:
# Task and Solutions Professional Services – 2.3 Business Consultants and 2.8 Business Architects and 3.3 Project Leader Consultants - Level 2

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012486
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000244596
* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-04
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-05T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-11-17

## Tender Description

Health Canada, Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) has a requirement for professional services to support projects on an as-needed basis. The required services include:

* Business Consultants (2.3)
* Business Architects (2.8)
* Project Leader (3.3)

These services are envisaged to begin upon contract award and continue for a period of three years.

## Requirements

* The service provider must have a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP).
* The service provider personnel requiring access to protected information, assets, or sensitive work sites must have a valid reliability status granted or approved by the CSP.
* The service provider must adhere to the Contract Security Manual (latest edition) and the security requirements checklist.

## Estimated Level of Effort

* Business Consultants (2.3): 1000 days
* Business Architects (2.8): 1100 days
* Project Leader (3.3): 400 days

## regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity and End User Entities

* Contracting Entity: Health Canada
* End User Entities: Health Canada

## Contact Information

* Name: Yvonne Murphy
* Email: yvonne.murphy@hc-sc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343.543.1965

## Services Tendered

This tender is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the categories mentioned above. A total of 14 companies have been invited to submit proposals.

Please note that the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Those interested in finding out how to become a "Qualified Supplier" can do so by contacting SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.  I have omitted any unnecessary information to stay within
